title: The Darcy Cousins
description: There are a few surprises in store when Fitzwilliam Darcy and his family gather at Rosings Park, as they have done every year in the spring. Lady Catherine de Bourgh is horrified when Clarissa Darcy, Darcy's American cousin, bursts upon the scene, seemingly determined to cause mischief. To make matters worse, Georgiana Darcy, usually a shy model of propriety, decides to take a few lessons from her unconventional cousin, to the delight of a certain neighboring gentleman. Even Mr Fitzwilliam Darcy himself seems infected with this strange spirit of rebellion as he confronts his aunt.Meanwhile, in all the upheaval, Anne de Bourgh simply...vanishes.But the trouble really starts when Clarissa and Georgiana both set out to win the heart of the same young gentleman...Georgiana Darcy is the star of the show in this delightful and youthful romp through the London Season.(20100309)
author: Monica Fairview
